name: Optara
description: Optara is a training and placement platform that helps institutes, colleges and universities facilitate placements for their students. Optara is a free platform for institutions to provide multiple career opportunities to their students from thousands of employers across India and track their progression. Optara enables the Training and Placement Officer at an institution to onboard their students onto the platform where students can learn, acquire new skills, create their professional profile and view and apply for most relevant jobs matching their skills and aspirations.  Benefits of Optara  For the institutions of higher learning  Free platform for facilitating training and placement of students Thousands of job opportunities from multiple sources on a single platform Learning platform for training students Mass communication and messaging platform Facilitate campus placement drives Reports and dashboards of career progression of students  For students  Professional profile builder and resume creation Access to jobs from thousands of employers across the country Personalised services for career guidance, counselling and placement Learning and upskilling  Opportunities to earn while learning via on the job training  Optara is free. Sign up your institute today.
